verbs.description: [ARG0: Russia] [V: interfered] [ARG1: in the United States ' 2016 presidential election] [ARGM-PRP: with the intention of helping President Donald Trump and hurting his opponent Hillary Clinton] , the bipartisan leaders of the Senate Intelligence Committee said in a statement on Wednesday .
